graphql.query:
mutation createOrUpdateOrganization($dto: OrganizationInputDto!, $id:String){
  createOrUpdateOrganization(dto: $dto, id:$id){
    code
    message
    data{
      id
      createdAt
      createdBy
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
      deletedAt
      deletedBy
      businessLicense
      identityCardBackImg
      identityCardFrontImg
      tags
      desc
      name
      tel
      address
      longitude
      latitude
      logo
      frontImgs{
        id
        url
        remark
      }
      roomImgs{
        id
        url
        remark
      }
      otherImgs{
        id
        url
        remark
      }
    }
  }
}

mutation createOrUpdateOrganization($dto: OrganizationInputDto!, $id:String){
  createOrUpdateOrganization(dto: $dto, id:$id){
    code
    message
    data{
      id
      createdAt
      createdBy
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
      deletedAt
      deletedBy
      businessLicense
      identityCardBackImg
      identityCardFrontImg
      tags
      desc
      name
      tel
      address
      longitude
      latitude
      logo
      frontImgs{
        id
        url
        remark
      }
      roomImgs{
        id
        url
        remark
      }
      otherImgs{
        id
        url
        remark
      }
    }
  }
}

query getOrganizationInfo($id: String!) {
    getOrganizationInfo(id: $id) {
      code
      message
      data {
        id
        createdAt
        createdBy
        updatedAt
        updatedBy
        deletedAt
        deletedBy
        businessLicense
        identityCardBackImg
        identityCardFrontImg
        tags
        desc
        name
        tel
        address
        longitude
        latitude
        logo
        frontImgs {
          id
          url
          remark
        }
        roomImgs {
          id
          url
          remark
        }
        otherImgs {
          id
          url
          remark
        }
      }
    }
  }
